text: Share Tweet Email Copy Link Copied Kendra Wilkinson and Hank Baskett were spotted at their kid's sporting events on Sunday, despite the fact they recently split up. Two days after Wilkinson announced she and Baskett were going their separate ways, they are keeping true to their word and putting the kids first. The soon - to - be exes were both spotted supporting each of their children at different sporting events over the weekend. The reality TV star documented their family time together on her Instagram stories. Both Baskett and Wilkinson cheered on 8 - year - old son Hank IV while he was playing hockey.
